txt.en: The spy has been defeated, but Lagordal survives.
'I cannot deny your words.'
'Was this a trap, Ranger? Was I a fool to believe you?'
'We are done here, [placeholder].'
'But -- '
Erlys has ordered you to release Cariad.
You should wait for further commands from Erlys.
'Wait. Who's there?'
'We'll take Lagordal and question him.'
'I did not intend for this to happen, I swear it!'
'What is the meaning of this?'
'These Dunlendings intend to kill me!'
A Ranger has demanded to know the reason behind the Dunlendings' presence here.\n\nYou should tell her what has happened.
Accompanied by Erlys and Igrain, you set out for Tornhad to save Cariad.
'Why don't you tell them the truth, [placeholder]? They clearly do not trust us.'
There is still the question of Lagordal's fate.
'Never. I was trying to maintain what little peace we had.''
You have helped free Cariad and end Lagordal's scheming.\n\nYou should talk to Erlys.
'But you've ruined it. Saruman will continue to harry us!'
'This man is one of the fugitives you're looking for, yes? I can direct you to the rest.'
'What power do we hold against the wizard?!'
'No. That's not a life I want.'
'It matters not. The fewer Rangers we meet along the way, the better.'
'No. We know he is guilty. That is all we need.'
'Perhaps. But not knowing where they are makes me uneasy.
'I have chosen my side. Choose yours wisely.'
Confront Lagordal and the spy
You have strayed too far from Erlys and Igrain
'Listen, duvodiad, every single last one of you!'
'I see the wizard's words have swayed you, Ranger.'
Follow Erlys
Eavesdrop on Lagordal and the spy
'Long did our ancestors dwell in the Angle, before yours came with blades and a hunger to conquer.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not stray too far from Erlys and Igrain</rgb>
'You cannot push us out any longer. We shall stay.'
'There's no use hiding from me. Show yourself!'
'Do not mistake this for me helping you.'
'Is this not a Ranger stronghold? Where are the Rangers?'
'The Dúnedain have enough worries to tend to.'
'There are other ways to survive. Saruman cares not for us.'

'I must confess, if it were not for your presence, I would have thought the Dunlendings were here for vengeance.\n\n'These accusations against Lagordal are grave. To see one of our own so readily aid the White Wizard's spies... it is distressing, to say the least.'
'There is a long road ahead, with many hurts to mend first.'
You should follow Erlys.
'[placeholder], untie Cariad's bonds.'
You should stay hidden with Erlys and Igrain to eavesdrop.
'I'm glad that you proved me wrong, duvodiad.\n\n'Before you set out again, come back and share a meal with us.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Igrain has been defeated!</rgb>
'The Cuan-lûth will never see Saruman as an ally, but neither will we offer you aid.'
'If you take them and leave, I'll let you go peacefully.'
'Onwards, then.'
Talk to Erlys
'I recognize the woman with them. A spy, like me.'
Confront Lagordal and the spy
'I'm sorry, Erlys. My quest for peace was an ill-fated one.'
Defend Erlys and Igrain
'These fugitives are just one more problem to be solved.'
'Let's observe. Do not leave this area, lest they see us!'
Wait for Erlys to question Lagordal
'Then prove it now. My life for the White Hand!'
'Why would a Ranger like you help me?'
Release Cariad from his bonds
'You understand now. Peace is not easy.'
You should talk to Erlys before approaching Tornhad.
'Do what you wish with Lagordal, then. His fate is no longer ours.'
'Hold! There's Cariad.'
'Igrain? Why are you...'
Wait for further commands from Erlys
Talk to the Ranger
'I may not trust the Rangers, but I'd like to do this with minimal bloodshed if possible. Follow me.'
Wait for Lagordal's sentencing
'Just to have enemies on both sides of this war?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Erlys has been defeated!</rgb>
Talk to Erlys
Instance: At A Cross-roads
The spy has noticed your presence.\n\nYou should confront her and Lagordal with your allies.
'And now you know what befalls those who dare to endanger my people.'
The confrontation has ended violently.\n\nYou should defend Erlys and Igrain.
